name: user_notice_qualifier_test19
notice: q6:  Section 4.2.1.5 of RFC 3280 states the maximum size of explicitText is 200 characters, but warns that some non-conforming CAs exceed this limit.  Thus RFC 3280 states that certificate users SHOULD gracefully handle explicitText with more than 200 characters.  This explicitText is over 200 characters long
